response.original_title: Sister Cantaloupe: Laffin' Out Loud With the Lord!
response.overview: Trina Jeffrie aka Sister Cantaloupe is the undisputed First Lady of Christian Comedy. Her spirit-filled comedy and her many other characters not only make you laugh, but challenge you to think about your walk with Christ!
response.tagline: Oh, Oh... you've gone and done it now!
response.title: Sister Cantaloupe: Laffin' Out Loud With the Lord!
